gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 114, Nets 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Donovan Mitchell led the Cavaliers with 27 points, five rebounds, and six assists on the way to a 114-113 win over Brooklyn. Max Strus added 27 points (7-13 3PT FG), along with a career-high 12 rebounds and two assists as Darius Garland totaled 15 points and five assists for the Cavaliers. Cam Thomas led the Nets with 36 points (13-21 FG), three rebounds, and two assists while Mikal Bridges added 20 points, six rebounds, and four assists.
